Manx: Bioghys veih baase dy ve er mayrn
English: Enlivenment; from death to be surviving
Diplomatic: Biogys veih baase dy ve er marn

Manx: Te son dy bragh ayns bea
Diplomatic: Te son dy bragh ayns bea

English: The glorious gift of your grace

Manx: As gow my annym stiagh gys fea
English: And in take my soul to rest
Diplomatic: As ghow my annym stiagh gys fea

English: Together with You in the delight of Heaven

Manx: Ny eashyn beayn dy hraa y cheau
English: The eternal ages of time to spend
Diplomatic: Ny eashyn beeayn dy chra y cheau

Manx: Yn kairoo laa yeig jeh yn vee skerree jeh’n geurey aynsyn vlein nee cheead yeig
English: The fourteenth of January in the year nineteen hundred
Diplomatic: Yn kairoo laa yeig jeh yn vee skerree jeh’n geurey aynsyn velin nee cheead yeig.
